name: Flapple
description: The Apple Wing Pokémon. It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.

abilities.name: Ripen
abilities.description: Doubles the effects of berries consumed.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.
